data.actual_result: You don't have the option to move yourself to other voice channels
data.expected_result: You should have the option to move yourself to other voice channels
data.short_description: Unable to move yourself to a different voice channel from the mini profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have the "Move Members" permission - Join a voice channel - Tap on the three dots by your name to open the mini profile - Observe the lack of a "Move to" option
